title: Figure of the Child Horus Standing
description:
Dark red-purple faience figure of the child Horus standing. Body nude with left leg advanced, left arm at side and right hand held at mouth. Side-lock on head. Arms in the round. Plinth piereced horizontally.
Condition: Both feet missing. Object of fine quality of its type. Glaze worn on body.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
